title: Fmr Minister Pandu Bandaranaike arrested
body_lines: Former Minister Pandu Bandaranaike has been arrested while attempting to sell three elephant pearls for Rs. 10 million.
According to police media spokesperson, three others were also placed under arrest along with the former minister.
The Police Special Task Force (STF) had taken them into custody in the area of Ampara this afternoon.
A gem-like stone has also been found in possession of the suspects.
